def_cn: 次要活动;附带事件;附属活动
def_en: A sideshow is a less important or less significant event or situation related to a larger, more important one that is happening at the same time.

def_cn: (马戏或游园会中穿插的)小节目，助兴表演,杂耍
def_en: At a circus or fair, a sideshow is a performance that you watch or a game of skill that you play, that is provided in addition to the main entertainment.
